segments.text: What sort of shopping is nearby , Mr . Taylor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Call me John . This is a great area of the city for shopping . There ’ s a grocery store just around the corner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about things other than food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the Riverside Mall has 200 stores in it , including four major department stores .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are there small shops near here as well ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , on 4th street , near the movie theater there are many specialty shops , including clothing boutiques .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it ’ s a really nice neighborhood .
segments.speaker: S2
